H0.text: On what play by George Bernard Shaw is the musical My Fair Lady based. Arms and the Man

H1.text: On what play by George Bernard Shaw is the musical My Fair Lady based. Candida

H2.text: On what play by George Bernard Shaw is the musical My Fair Lady based. The Doctor's Dilemma

H3.text: On what play by George Bernard Shaw is the musical My Fair Lady based. Pygmalion

A4.text: Pygmalion became the playwright's most popular play, enduring in popular culture as the heavily adapted and romanticized My Fair Lady (1956 musical and 1964 film).

A5.text: Pygmalion is a play written by Irish playwright George Bernard Shaw in 1912, named after the Greek mythological figure.
